类 DependencyParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • DependencyParser

  • public class DependencyParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Plays the role of parsing a list of (direct) dependency of a given Artifact. It uses HTTP based fetcher to retrieve a POM file and return the Dependencies lists on the POM file.
    作者:
    Yizhong Ding

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      DependencyParser()

      (专用程序包) static java.lang.String searchOnlineVersion(java.lang.String childGroupId, java.lang.String childArtifactId)

        public DependencyParser()

    • 方法详细资料

      • fetchDependencies

        public static java.util.List<Artifact> fetchDependencies(Artifact artifact)
        This Method fetches the dependency list by parsing the POM file.
        参数:
        artifact - The target artifact to get dependencies.
        返回:
        Returns a list of artifact dependencies.

      • searchOnlineVersion

        static java.lang.String searchOnlineVersion(java.lang.String childGroupId,
                                            java.lang.String childArtifactId)
        If the dependency version is not specified int the POM file, the program will search the coordinate on Maven central library to fetch the first available version.
        参数:
        childGroupId - target group id of a dependency
        childArtifactId - target artifact id of a dependency
        返回:
        returns first available version on Maven Central Library. returns null if it does not exists.

      • fetchVersion

        public static java.lang.String fetchVersion(org.jdom2.Element responses)
        Fetch available version by finding the first version in "str name='v'" element
        参数:
        responses - response of the Http request that is in the format of a Pom file
        返回:
        returns the available version string. returns null if it does not exists.

      • checkArtifactId

        public static boolean checkArtifactId(java.lang.String childArtifactId)
        Helper methods for checking if ArtifactId is a variable
        参数:
        childArtifactId - target artifact id
        返回:
        a boolean value indicating if the input is valid

      • checkGroupId

        public static boolean checkGroupId(java.lang.String childGroupId)
        Helper methods for checking if GroupId is a variable
        参数:
        childGroupId - target group id
        返回:
        a boolean value indicating if the input is valid

      • checkVersion

        public static boolean checkVersion(org.jdom2.Element version)
        Helper methods for checking if Version string is a variable
        参数:
        version - target version
        返回:
        a boolean value indicating if the input is valid
